website_summaries.verdict: Fits iPhone 7 and 8, and designed to stay put.
pros: Allows your iPhone's original design and color to to appear through the case's transparent material
One of the few cases that works with multiple iPhone generations

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My phone fell off my car seat onto the concrete and I thought the edge of my phone on the back was cracked, but it wasnt! The case did its job!! I'll be ordering more-one to replace the one I have now and another one for my son's phone!
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star case
customer_reviews.text: It’s on my iPhone 7 plus right now. Simple to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Talmage

customer_reviews.title: Rather Heavy and Slidy
customer_reviews.text: Rather heavy for a case and keeps sliding off the surfaces. Looks extremely beautiful, sturdy and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They are not scratch proof or anything like you see on Instagram posts but they are very sleek and if you drop it once you’re probably done with that case lol. But it did save my phone one time while I was on a scooter. The case got demolished but my phone was fine
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Giron

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what the description states!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today but I am already in love and want different colors!
customer_reviews.author: barbara dekoski

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Protects your phon but not the front screen. Works well tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love thats it is not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Seems somewhat durable still a little leary if dropping when using. Very sleek Which I like phone not so bulky with this case
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Greer

customer_reviews.title: Case will open if you drop it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the case, the looks, how it works... until today. My phone took its first tumble... I’m happy to say that the case is intact.. on the other hand, my brand new iPhone 8 is full of scratches. The magnetic case opened as it hit the ground and my phone went flying out hitting the ground. Very disappointing. I’m getting a better case today. Can I still return this product?
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: just got it and love it but thought I ordered the RED one not ...
customer_reviews.text: just got it and love it but thought I ordered the RED one not the BLACK one... Looks very high tech and really like the feel of the case, seems very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and fits on my phone well. I’m happy with the quality. The only thing I didn’t love was the white color is more silver than white.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best case I’ve had since otter box!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this product! It was so easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my case in the mail and I put it on my phone. It’s very nicely made with the metal sides and glass back. The buttons give you nice feedback. It’s almost as if I’m not wearing a case at all and I like that. This case is not for ppl that drop their phones a lot! It’s mostly for looks the magnets are strong and the the 2 piece case design is seemless when it’s on your phone. Mos definitely get this case if you are into thin stylish yet not very protective cases lol. It will take a drop but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good is identical to the sample, I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel viveros

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My phone fell once and the back glass of the case cracked but the phone was fine. Other than that is a very sturdy case
customer_reviews.author: Lissi25

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart constantly, the back plastic piece cracked. Won’t prevent your screen from cracking if dropped. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case and it did not fit my phone. I got 3 corners to fit together but could not get the fourth corner to seal or close all the way. I have reported this to the seller and I do not have a resolution yet. He did respond to my initial message and gave me instructions on how to apply. They were the exact instructions that came with the case, I read them prior to trying to install the case. I am hoping for a good resolution in the next day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: BLOCKS SIGNAL !!  Even though it has small signal ports.
customer_reviews.text: It's really too bad... because this case looks great, and feels great in the hand and pocket. A week or 2 after having my case, I noticed dropped calls... low bars, and as of very recently... "NO SIGNAL" at all in my house... and I have never had this problem before. Today I removed the case completely... and all of a sudden I had 3 bars of signal. I gave it 2 stars instead of 1... only because of the way it looks and feels, but for me, a strong signal outweighs the appearance of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Around Case Can Cause Reception Issues!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled! This case looks awesome, but aware- it’s not front and back - it’s back glass and a bumper around the front with a glass screen you install yourself before adding the case on. Makes sense tho! ALSO- I ABSOLUTELY LOST SIGNAL STRENGTH WITH THIS CASE! Both WiFi and Cellular signal issues. Lasty, this case is slippery as heck! It’s very sleek, but it wasn’t the right case for me. I’m very clumsy and I am so afraid I’d drop it. It’s still really cool lol
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Got a month to wait for it?
customer_reviews.text: Took over a month to get here. I probably almost canceled the order a hundred times. Snapped it on, dropped it like five minutes later and case popped off.
customer_reviews.author: james p gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Phone cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Product is light weight but not durable. I was so excited to receive product as it seemed a great concept to use magnets to hold together and keep phone trim and not bulky. However, the day I put it on my phone I dropped my phone on the tile from waist high. It hit the corner and dented the frame and now it will not close all the way. It also caused damage to my mom's phone seal/ screen. It cracked under the screen and causes glitches when I type now. So frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the case!!! Fits perfect and the magnet just snaps on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: my girl loves it simple to use. easy to hold. and the rewards are worth it weight
customer_reviews.author: MegaDad

customer_reviews.title: Better not drop your phone with this case
customer_reviews.text: The case came apart (into two pieces) whenever it fell. The final time, my brand new iPhone tumbled across outdoor concrete and left it with deeply embedded scratches on two corners. Angry, I tossed this in the garbage and immediately bought a $7 flimsy case off Amazon that has offered my phone way more protection in the year and a half since. Don’t buy this unless you like playing Russian roulette.
customer_reviews.author: EndOfTheRoad

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery and falls easily
customer_reviews.text: The case is too slippery and easily slides out of your hands, off flat surfaces like tables, and out of pockets. You have to be extra careful or you will end up with a broken phone. A nice idea with a magnetic case but not worth the money if you have to guard your phone from slipping all the time. A matte finish would be better to prevent slippage.
customer_reviews.author: AshGrayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a screen protector too!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s great so far I’ve been using it all day and I love it. I seen it on Instagram, and immediately I wanted one. Mine lines up perfectly with no over hang or over lapping as some people had problems with. The only complaint I have is that I wish the charger slot was a tad bigger then I’d be perfect. It also came with a screen protector too!
customer_reviews.author: Zebastian

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not buy super bad never would recommend rather not have a case on than this
customer_reviews.text: I loved the easy to put on and fun to figit with but the magnet broke it’s not protective at all and I really need a new screen now which is “great” I do not reccomned ever buying this item you might as well just not have a case on and the magnet on the case broke on the first fall it’s to slippery gets very cold during winter because it’s a metal frame all in all not worth it. It also moves a lot when you shake it or while walking very annoying falls out of case randomly it’s terrible and I wish I returned it before I cracked my phone
customer_reviews.author: david betesh

customer_reviews.title: Magnets disrupt service
customer_reviews.text: The magnets that hold the case together disrupt my reception so bad. It’s a pretty case but if you drop if the case comes apart. I don’t feel confident this will protect my phone .
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a phone case with a metal pad that would stick to a magnetic phone holder. It doesn’t have that. It is very smooth to hold / easy to slip out of my hand. A rubberized grip on the sides would gave eliminated this problem.
customer_reviews.author: torch892

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: Case looks good. Thin. Shiny and you can display your Iphone, but it is slippery. My husband has dropped his phone at least 3x now, because the case is so slippery. If you value your iphone, don't waste your money. You will drop it and eventually it will crack.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dolberry

customer_reviews.title: Not durable case. Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: The case is very nice but slippery. It fell out of my pocket at work and hit the floor. I have only had the case for 2 days. now the case doesn’t stay together like it should. I would pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Case does not fit phone (iPhone 8+)
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve read all of the comments before buying. So sad, because I usually do. This product is not worth the hassle. Was so excited when it came in. Hope that the comments were false. But they weren’t, the case doesn’t even fit my iPhone 8+. I would have to scratch my screen or break the case trying to get it in. Sent back the same day I received it. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery case
customer_reviews.text: This case slides on any surface. I’m scared this case will break my phone. No matter where I sit it my phone falls to the floor. Have to charge my phone on the floor. The case is a really nice looking case. Had it for a few days and even though it has fallen a number of times due to how slippery this case is my phone has not cracked or the case hopefully it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi T

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a product I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I thought it came with a front glass cover instead it’s just a simple screen protector. It’s also very slick & easy to drop, when it falls it breaks apart each time. Not very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: isn't the best neither the worst
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful and different cover, the strength of the magnets is good. The bad thing is that when it falls in 90% of cases it opens and the phone goes out but does not suffer considerable damage. When the cover falls, it is mistreated and does not close 100%. The back part is easily scratched. It allows 99% wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing like the description. Shows and says it’s a case on top with tempered glass back. Not true. Look at the pic. False advertising. I also want full refund. Not partial like Amazon has been doing
customer_reviews.author: Tami Alwood

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but l found the case no put atetion on the massage l sent you yesterday less looking in my drawer l got it thank you . I will change it now lam teadind the instructions . It say that l have to buy a front screen protector . Which one. I need to buy ? Because this one came with one is simple but l don't know if it is enough protection for my cellphone .
customer_reviews.author: María guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent prodict, have nothing bad to say about it, recommend to buy Seller is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: This case is so slippery .!!! I think the magnets on it make it randomly fall off of things. Like my desk at work. I know weird right. It’s a nice , slick and functional case honestly but if you want to hold on to your phone this case is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not what’s expected
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity of this case is great. It IS NOT scratch resistant as some videos show. This case can be very slippery and easily slide off surfaces. Would be nice if the edges were coated with rubber. Because of this my phone slipped from my hands and from surfaces more than any iPhone I previously owned. Granted the case did its part by protecting my phone. But the case did not stand up to the drops. It became warped and was never straight again.
customer_reviews.author: DStark

customer_reviews.title: To keep safe my phone
customer_reviews.text: Damaged my phone from first time,the case don’t deserve $0 ,its sleppery ,doesn’t stay fixed,the parts are coming out all the time if you want to damage your phone then buy this case
customer_reviews.author: Doina

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the signal
customer_reviews.text: It blocks the signal. I like the case but it drops my signal and even won’t stay connected to my Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, not so great execution
customer_reviews.text: I liked the IDEA of this case, but the construction left a lot to be desired. It only took dropping my phone once for it to bend out of shape and leave a nice dent on the phone itself. And once it bent that admittedly tiny bit, there was no getting it back into shape so the magnets aligned again. So back it went. I really wanted to like this case. It showed off my pretty red phone and it was nice and slim. But I just couldn't take the risk of breaking my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wise

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for good protection
customer_reviews.text: It’s attractive and slim but did not provide stability or good protection. I wouldn’t recommend this if you are looking for something durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Too Slippery.
customer_reviews.text: This case is very nice looking, but that is about it. The magnetic closing is a cool gimmick too, but.... This case is not great, because it slips and slides everywhere. Seriously, you can put it On a flat surface and it will slide off onto the floor. I have dropped this thing half a dozen times in 1 day of having it. It has slide off the couch arm, table, even the charger a few minutes ago. Sorry, but it’s going back. It looks cool and is as described, but way to slippery for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gregory

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a good phone case ..
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t what it says .. only one side has a cover on it.. it open up and my phone cracked my phone .. it’s nit a protected case .. it’s horrible.. I would like a refund ..
customer_reviews.author: Jayne J.

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it once and the protector did what it needed to do but it barely closes now. Will order another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This case is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Does not protect your phone at all. Also the glass back is a terrible idea. When you set it on a table or anything it slides off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit my phone
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my iPhone 8 Plus. This really deserves zero stars. Don’t waste your time on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, configuration and material for daily and regular use
customer_reviews.text: This is not good case , its too slippery and if kept on flat surface chances are your phone will slide . Very difficult to charge on using wireless charger. And one small fall will take out the case and phone apart. And the scratches are random even though if u dont use it much. Had to replace with something stable and durable
customer_reviews.author: prashant

customer_reviews.title: slippery but well made
customer_reviews.text: Great case!! Perfect magnetic 🧲 case . Sturdy durable and looks good! I would recommend buying a pop socket though because this case does make the phone slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, but not really worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good case in the beginning. I had a couple of drops out of my pocket from about two feet and now one side is dented in that it doesn’t close all the way. If you want something that is more durable, make another choice.
customer_reviews.author: john b

customer_reviews.title: Little to no protection
customer_reviews.text: Origionally I liked this case for its sleek minimalist design but after dropping my phone with the case on it s couple of times I will never buy a case like this again. Whenever you drop it the case will fall off the phone because of how weak the magnets are. It’s add to a sort of shock absorber but your phone can bounce out and get it’s screen cracked. Put your ten dollars towards a slim otter box and do your phone a favor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected more like a double sided cover, but noooo. Plus, it’s very slippery
customer_reviews.author: louis Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: What I like about it is smooth and looks good. I don’t like it’s fragile and it gets dusty on the back of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Slip and slide.
customer_reviews.text: This case is so sleek and slippery that, no matter what surface I put my phone on, it slips right off and falls. Weird. But nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mojica

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: When looking at the specks, it doesn’t look the same. But over all the item is built good. Someone in our family will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Teachworth

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The phone accidentally fell to the ground. As a result, the very strong back glass that you said was broken. Can this be repaired?
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: At first look the case was great. It is thin and the magnets work well. But it is extremely weak. Both cases I purchased broke with one drop. I would not recommend this if you are thinking that it’s going to last after one drop.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish but not a good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good case if you want one to protect your phone but a nice clean and stylish case. I like the style and the clear glass at the back but keep in mind that if u drop it multiple times it will eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the case and I believe it is a good durable case. My only drawback is it is very slick. You have to hang on to it really well or it will slip out of your hands. If you lay it down if it vibrates it can easily slide of a surface.
customer_reviews.author: GSS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did not like at all. It’s not worth the money. Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not accurate to what you get!!
customer_reviews.text: Product only had the back portion. There is no front cover like is depicted in the picture. Do not waste your money. Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No way!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this. Within an hour after putting it on, my phone fell and this box went flying in pieces. NO WAY!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery - not easy to hold your phone.
customer_reviews.text: Returning - way to slippery. However decent concept just wish it wasn’t so slippery. Kept slipping out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: No grip
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and the magnet is cool idea .. but this slides too much there’s no grip to it , and if u drop your phone the case comes apart right away leaving the phone to receive damage .. had just replaced my tempered glass and already need to replace again after the 1st drop
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: I just got this case haven’t dropped it or slid it around but it is covered in scratches looks very ugly with them but the case is relatively easy to install and comes with a screen protector
customer_reviews.author: irma viera

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Good design but in 2 days the back part was cracked already and I didn’t drop it
customer_reviews.author: Coltrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lose grip and cannot sustain a drop
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed case first few days i had it on. Cool design. Very slick and easy to lose grip. First drop and case shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Daniel Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not so much durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had it one day and dropped it maybe 10 inches off the ground and it cracked the back of the case. I thought it was supposed to be durable. Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hoferer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are somewhat weak, the whole things falls open when it dropped. It looks nice, but it’s not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywoodorchid

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: When it got here the back glass was already cracked. Every time you drop it, the two pieces fly apart and the top piece bends and doesn’t fit back on. The case is slick and falls out of your pocket constantly. Last time it fell out of my pocket the whole back shattered
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: It comes wrong size and completely different from the picture
customer_reviews.author: Salma

customer_reviews.title: GPS does not work while case is on
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you like using your gps. I’m assuming the magnetic part of this case messes with the gps and I’m very disappointed. I have to take it off if I want to use my gps. I’m not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Decent case but really don’t protect the phone. Dropped it once on laminate flooring and the case popped off. The case is like a soft tin and scratched easy when dropped on laminate. Other then that’s it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the Magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Product looked and worked great, however after a short time....my phone experienced cellular difficulties. Their is no proof...but after a phone trade in and no longer using the case.... the problem no longer arose. Could be due to the magnets???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not all it’s made out to be
customer_reviews.text: Mine is scratched on the “tempered glass” side 🤷‍♀️ Also dropped it and the cover just popped right off. Phone was ok but it didn’t fall far. Very slick, no grip But pretty, very pretty...
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Good but beware of micro scratches
customer_reviews.text: Overall good case. However, micro scratches will develop when using a cloth to remove dust from inside of the back cover. That is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it ONE time out of my car, car was parked and it fell off my lap getting out (maybe a foot down) and the frame of the case bent and now won’t snap shut.
customer_reviews.author: emilee

customer_reviews.title: This is a very bad product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it for my phone fine but it is so slippery if you have a 1 % slope ration it will no joke slide off. My phone has hit the ground over 10 times I finally took the thing off.
customer_reviews.author: Cohl

customer_reviews.title: SLIPPERY
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE LOOK AND FEEL OF THE CASE, BUT IT'S VERY SLICK. WHEN YOU SET IT DOWN ON SOMETHING THE LEAST BIT SLANTED IT SLIDES ALL OVER. SLIPPERY IN YOUR HANDS TOO.
customer_reviews.author: John E Thorkildsen

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading. The front part of the case doesn’t have the glass. It does come with a screen protector but there are better options for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To fit I Phone 8 Plus but didn’t fit. Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought for I Phone 8Plus. It didn’t fit too small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Phone Case sucks...DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product was truly bad. It is not protective and after a few drops the case will crack open or dent very easily, even from drops less than 12 inches off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone case on my phone for no less than 3 hours and dropper it on to my gym bag from about 8 inches up and the whole back cover shattered into pieces!! Would not buy this item..
customer_reviews.author: Eric pauli

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The case only lasted about a month, the first time my phone slipped out of my pocket it cracked. The distance from my pocket to the floor was about two feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It shatters easy
customer_reviews.text: Its terible when ever you drop it it brakes of then u have to put it back together it shatters easy and its only good thing is that its satisfying
customer_reviews.author: Jayden Torres

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Especially liked the fact that the product is not bulky, does not make the phone bigger than it has to be
customer_reviews.author: Shanae Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Phone slides slightly up and down
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying that this case is very sturdy and the magnets are very strong! The problem is that there’s a slight movement up-and-down on the phone which may cause wear in those areas over time.
customer_reviews.author: David Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: First drop from about 2 feet up and the back cracked. Wasn't even on gravel or pavement, it was indoors. The case looks and feels amazing, but not worth the hassle because of how poor of quality the back is.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Cracked easily!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the case cracked so easily when it fell out of my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Case
customer_reviews.text: Cool case, but breaks easily. Don’t think I even dropped it and the back glass cracked. Dropped it once and the case got hit and isn’t usable anymore. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Liviu Oniga

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: product looked great online went to put it on my phone and the lock button and the lower volume button does not work with the case on waste of money
customer_reviews.author: jake dodero

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! It’s just a breakable piece of crap. Dosent protect anything on your phone and your camera is toatally exposed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K Argyle

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the magnetic feature, I like that it’s see through, the only complaint I have is that the case scratches easily! I wiped it down wit a paper towel and just with that it was all scratched up. Not a good look
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This things is not the best quality, my phone fell once and the magnetic peace broke right away. It doesn’t cover anything my temper glass broke when it fell. Not worth your money. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Shatters so easily
customer_reviews.text: Received first case and it shattered first day I had it on my phone. Then got another that was shattered before even opening the package. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 Plus case
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got her case and loves it except in the picture it looked pink. Also there she dropped it one time and came aprt
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for less than a week. I had the case and screen protector on the phone when it fell off a shelf less than 2 feet high, and my screen is now cracked in several places. This product is not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Looks great but doesn’t protect the phone at all. Cheap and will never purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Hard to handle . The silence button won’t be reachable. Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: Hard to handle . The silence button won’t be reachable. Not a great design

product_meta.title: iPhone 8 Plus Case,iPhone 7 Plus Case, ZHIKE Magnetic Adsorption Case Metal Frame Tempered Glass Back with Built-in Magnet Cover for Apple iPhone 7Plus/8 Plus (Red, iPhone 7 Plus/8 Plus)
feature_bullets: 【Magnetic adsorption design】: Strong magnetic field adsorption technology take you to the new case era. From now on, case installing became a pleasure. It makes your iPhone stand out among crowd.

【Super easy installation】: Magnetic strong adsorption mobile phone shell (a total of 16 magnetic points) automatic closing, easy to assemble. More methods of installation are waiting for you to find out.

【All-round defence】: Full body metal frame protection & Anti-drop & Shock-absorbing design. Raised bezels lift screen and camera off flat surfaces, toughend nanoglass back, anti-scratch & anti-dirty, protect your phone from scratching, shock & smudge, premium materials offer unrivaled protection and enhanced durability.(please kindly note that the tempered glass is in the back, there has no tempered glass in the front.)

【Precise Cut Outs】: Support wireless charging and will not affect the signal transmission. It's super seamless when the case pieces touch, slim cover fits well to your device and make it easy to access to all ports, speakers, chargers and all iPhone features.
【100% Satisfaction】: For all the phone case purchased from "ZHIKE-US", we offer 7 days Return & Refund policy after you received items, and 24 hours customer service.
